title: Robotic Process Automation
headline: This free online automation course helps you ensure that output is complete, correct, and consistent between tasks.
description: This free online course explores how you can simplify your work processes as a developer. Learn how robotic process automation (RPA) creates softer robots that can help you perform routine processes. You will also study the numerous applications and advantages of RPA to different sectors as well as the components being a UiPath developer. Sign up for this course and boost your IT career skills today!
courseDescription:
This course teaches you the fundamentals of robotic process automation (RPA) and how you can apply it in your organization to simplify your workload and work towards becoming a certified UiPath developer. It guides you through the process of building real-life projects and helps you understand the basics of UiPath RPA development. Learn how robotic process automation creates softer robots known as automation that can help you perform processes done on a daily basis. See how robots emulate human actions and use the same input like a keyboard or mouse but without touching them physically. Robots communicate fast with existing systems, find information faster, make simple decisions as well as interacting with other systems. Discuss the advantages of RPA over the traditional automation software as it is capable of recognizing deviations when confronted with large volumes of data. You will also learn how RPA allows different systems of an ecosystem to interact. This includes machine learning, data analytics and predictions, including applications that are installed in the corporate environment like IBM or SAP. This course further illustrates the benefits of RPA including the elimination of human errors.

Next, you will analyze how RPA helps different sectors (such as banking and e-commerce) and organizations speed up processes while reducing costs. The retail industry has a lot of challenges keeping up its supplies. This implies a lot of effort for organizing and handling multiple orders and invoices. You will study the benefits of RPA in retail where a robot can handle demand-and-supply planning. This could involve creating a robot that handles the inventory as well as placing orders and making sure that they arrive according to the order management. Another area of focus is the implementation of RPA to assist hospital management in covering complicated and time-consuming processes such as from data flow between departments, paperwork digitization, and patient-data compliances. Furthermore, you will discuss the sales sector and the importance of driving the revenue of the company. You will identify the plethora of responsibilities of the sales department like reporting, invoicing and updating inventory. Learn how RPA could help free up some tasks so that people have more time to improve the customer experience. This course also illustrates data manipulation, UiPath selectors, and the UiPath Studio.

By taking this course, you will build on your knowledge and skills to become a robotic process automation developer. It provides a healthy foundation to achieve this milestone. Finally, this is a complete course for beginners that would help you to get the UiPath developer certification, which can be divided into three parts. The first part explains how to install UiPath and identify elements on the screen like buttons or text fields, including how to create a robust selector. The second part, named Hands-on Robot, is where we build a practical robot and learn how to get information from web pages, PDF and Excel files etc. The third part deals with quiz questions that are required to pass the UiPath developer foundation exam. It also explains why each answer is correct and why the other is not. After successfully completing the three parts, you will be better equipped to pass the UiPath developer foundation test and boost your employability. The possibilities are endless as RPA developers are in huge demand. This course is ideal for anyone interested in automation technology and web development. 

Start Course Now
